item.title: About Kunal Kushwaha
item.description:
A wannabe Entrepreneur and Experienced Technical Leader in building multiple v1.0 version software’s, right from conceptualizing to delivery.

Have hands on experience in building enterprise storage products, Linux kernel block susbsystem hacking, RAID, High Available systems, Linux Containers and Docker.

Few of my area of interests are

  • Distributed systems
  • Scalability
  • Storage systems
  • Health Care
  • Cloud Technology

Drop me mail or connect me though social media.
